params.name: vision_config
params.type: Union[AutoConfig, dict],  optional, defaults to CLIPVisionConfig
params.description: The config object or dictionary of the vision backbone.

params.name: text_config
params.description: The config object or dictionary of the text backbone.

params.name: image_token_index
params.description: The image token index to encode the image prompt.

params.name: image_seq_length
params.description: Sequence length of one image embedding.
